channel.title: Need help with this compiler
channel.description:
hello i was woundering if this is right it is my compiler file
@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe"*java pause
because when i run i get this:
'javac*.java' is not recognized as operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
thanks hell-boy

item.title: Need help with this compiler
item.dc:creator: @hell-boy hell-boy
item.description:
@hell-boy wrote:

now i get

The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .

my path are

PATH: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin
CLASSPATH:C:\Program Files\Java\jre6[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2009, 01:47:31 pm[/size][hr]help!!!

item.title: Need help with this compiler
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
Fixt.

You also didnt put a space between the exeutable and options.
